Hi Pete,
I have just looked at your kozuka, this is not suri-hegashi gildin=
g but uttori-zogan that has worn through showing the typical 'holes' in the=
 inlay (or more properly 'overlay'), the last fruit is only just showing th=
e wear, some leaves are worn also, uttori zogan would not have a hole in th=
e top. The kozuka looks like 16th century Mino Goto, The early Goto did not=
 use suri-hegashi gilding.
Alan
